title: Miniature Portrait of Theodore Charles Martin
medium: watercolor on ivory, framed in burled wood over tortoise box lid  w/gold liner
provenance_text:
Edouard Paul dePont, Ann Arbor, Michigan. Mrs. Frank Hunter Potter, New York, NY [1]. Sold at E. M. Hodgkins, New York, NY; purchased by Herbert DuPuy [1856-], Pittsburgh, PA, April 20, 1917; gift to Department of Fine Arts, Carnegie Institute, Pittsburgh, PA, November 1927. 
NOTES: [1] Herbert DuPuy records that this item was in the collection of Edouard Paul dePont "and acquired through Mrs. Frank Hunter Potter, of New York City." It does not record if she was acting as his agent, or if she facilitated the purchase, or if she purchased it from dePont and then sold it to E. M. Hodgkins.
